comment: I took her online class for the Maymester and LOVED IT! The majority of her work is discussion posts, and those are graded easily. You have to read, but the discussion posts are from one section of the material. Tests are fair, definitions are half of it. Definitely would take again.

This course was perfect for Maymester. Professor is very responsive, engaging, and pleasant. The course was well developed (probably the best I've taken) and requires minimal effort to excel. Great study guides. I recommend the online book for this class. No extra credit and it is not needed. Definitely recommend this course.

Easy A but she's extremely rude and unclear about what she wants. Glad I took her online so that I didn't have to deal with her in person. I'd still recommend taking her class as it's an easy A, but don't expect an inspirational or even decent teacher.
Very straight forward teacher, easy class. Test based on study guide. Easy A with minimal preparation.
Took this class during Maymester - it was a breeze. Professor is very easy - don't waste a whole semester taking this class.
I took her for maymester and am so grateful. She responds quickly to emails and is very helpful. Her class was easy and she seemed very nice. Definitely take her!
Took this class online during Maymester - pretty easy class. Teacher is helpful and provides extra credit - which you probably won't need anyway :)

Definitely take this minimester! Super easy, totally worth it! I recommend the ebook - makes it easier to look things up. Professor Seaman was very fast to grade and respond to things too, which was nice. Take this course, you won't regret it!!
Just took her for the online class, and as everyone stated, it was SUPER easy! You know exactly what to do to make a good grade. Her study guides really help. Got an A! :)

Took the online class and it was super easy.  There are 3 tests which are online.  She gives study guides and plenty time to take the test online.  She is super nice and realizes that students are pnly taking the course because it is required.  Workload is completely managable.  TAKE HER!! You will thank me!
Super Easy. Was skeptical about taking an online minimester class but ended up getting an A. Everything is online so you get to use your book during the test.
Super easy, but boring.

Professor Seaman is extremely helpful and always available to her students!  She made this required class very enjoyable  and has an enjoyable curriculum!  Thank you Dr. Seaman!  Put forth the effort and it is an easy A!
This class is really easy. She is a little hard to read but an ok class.

This Minimester was more interesting than I thought. The material wasn't too bad and she really wanted everyone to make an A in the class. Willing to go out of her way to help anyone. Def more easier than the 16-week semester.
Kind of dull, but very easy.

Ez A+.3 tests multiple choice 20 quest/test.No final, no homework, 2 in class assignments,1 required presentation. U must attend 3 events for 30% of ur grade.Come to the review days 2-4 questions from the powerpoint review will be on the actual test.She posts all the powerpoints on vista! Attendence is not mandatory but you'll do better if u come.

This is by far one of the easiest classes I have ever taken. She is a nice teacher, but is a bit boring. Attendance is not mandatory. There are required performances/art exhibits that you have to attend. Tests are straight off of notes. I made a 100 in the class, and I have no interest in art.

I really didn't like this class much at first. I wasn't a fan of Medieval art, and I thought she was kind of dull. However, she turned out to be really nice and she knows her stuff. The work load isn't heavy at all, which is nice, but if you don't study or put effort into it, don't expect to pass her class.

Although this class is really easy, Professor Seaman is a great teacher. She really cares & is always available for questions. She posts grades the day of & always responds quickly to emails. I would take her again!

The course is easy during the minimester, but the prof is boring and takes too many breaks. that was  2.5 hour class stretched out over 8 hours each day. She is very quirky and harps on portraits too long.

Pros: She posts all lectures on vista and you can use it during tests, along with the book. No need to take notes bc of this. Expects you to read the night before but nobody does bc tests are open book/internet. No final, and she drops the lowest grade and replaces it with the highest. Everyone makes an A.   Cons: annoying voice/puts you to sleep

A delightful young lady. Very nice and approachable. Keeps the class current and relevant. She lacks some people skills and seems to not deal with adversity very well. She can get defensive. If you care about your education you can learn a good deal from her. Overall I would say that she is good but could be great.

A very nice lady with admirable accomplishments, but it didn't seemed like she was very interested in actually *teaching* the class. I decided it was in my best interests to cut my losses and drop the class. I will probably avoid any other class she teaches. Very unfortunate.

Easiest class I have ever taken! I'm currently taking this class during the wintermester. It's 5 days long from 9am-5:30pm everyday. We have 2 multiple choice assignments due each day. ALL assignments are open note, open book, open internet. We watch a video everyday. VERY EASY CLASS! I have a 100 and we only have one day left!
Her voice will drive you nuts. And her attitude is deplorable.She thinks she is the only one who has ever traveled and seen art. If you want a know it all with attitude and no compassion take her

Ms. Seamen is the easiest teacher. It's so easy to get an A. I got a 100 in the class and attended only 5 classes the whole semester. There are 3 tests, no final, one presentation. That's it. Her tests are super easy but you just have to know art work names and definitions. Easiest A in college by far! I would definitely recommend her!

The class was fairly easy but very boring. She gets offended and holds grudges like no other. If you get on her bad side, she will go out of her way to see to it that you regret taking her class. I did.

She is quite possibly the worst teacher I have ever come across. I made better than a 95 on everything I was graded on. She treated the entire class as if we were all art majors, and seemed to have little understanding of what is to be a tutelary. It's a ridiculously easy A. If you have any self respect, stay away from her.
Easy class but my worst class ever. She let her emotions get in the way of everything so if you got on her bad side then would get onto you about everything. Very boring. But it was an easy A.

veeryyyyy easy class, if you don't make an A it's because you didn't try to do your work. 3 out of 4 test were take home and simple. She loves art and gets offended if you text or talk a lot in class but overall - easy A.

This class is really easy! There are 4 event reports (going to art exhibits on campus) that you have to do.  These are easy 100s and worth 40% of your grade. Only 3 tests and 2 of them are take home. No Final! Lectures are pretty dull if your not interested in art but this class is an easy A.

Ms.Seaman's class is so easy. She gave us 5 tests (one with an optional paper) and the final. That's it. And she gives extra credit for almost every test. I have gotten 100s plus 5 points extra credit on each test. They are so easy! A lot of other people in the class are doing really bad. I guess they don't study at all. I only study the day before
